page.title: Users' testimonials
page.description: Users commenting on their experience with the Nice programming language.

blockquote.title: Nice is sweet!
blockquote.para: My experience thus far with Nice is very positive. The language design is very elegant. It is so nice to have a language that has a powerful type system combined with multiple dispatch. It is like combining the best of ML and Dylan. Kudos.

page.para: Note to Nice users: you are welcome to send your impressions on the language. You can also describe the projects you use Nice for, and they will be listed on this site.
